data.title: 2014 web archives – The American French Film Festival in Los Angeles
data.text:
FILMS

9-MONTH STRETCH (9 mois ferme)

Directed by: Albert Dupontel

Written by: Albert Dupontel, Héctor Cabello Reyes, Olivier Demangel

West Coast Premiere

ABUSE OF WEAKNESS (Abus de faiblesse)

Written and directed by: Catherine Breillat

West Coast Premiere

AGE OF PANIC (La Bataille de Solferino)

Written and directed by: Justine Triet

West Coast Premiere

A STRANGE COURSE OF EVENTS (Le Cours étrange des choses)

Directed by: Raphaël Nadjari

Written by: Raphaël Nadjari, Geoffroy Grison

North American Premiere

BABYSITTING

Directed by: Philippe Lacheau, Nicolas Benamou

Written by: Philippe Lacheau, Julien Arruti, Tarek Boudali

North American Premiere

BEAUTY AND THE BEAST (La Belle et la bête)

Directed by: Jean Cocteau

Written by: Jean Cocteau, based on the book by Jeanne-Marie

West Coast Premiere (restored version)

CHINESE PUZZLE (Casse-tête chinois)

Written and directed by: Cédric Klapisch

West Coast Premiere

FANNY

Directed by: Daniel Auteuil

Written by: Daniel Auteuil, based on the play by Marcel Pagnol

U.S. Premiere

FAVORITES OF THE MOON (Les Favoris de la lune)

Directed by: Otar Iosseliani

Written by: Otar Iosseliani, Gérard Brach

North American Premiere (restored version)

FLORE (Flore, route de la Mer)

Directed and written by: Jean-Albert Lièvre

Cinematography by: Jean-Albert Lièvre

West Coast Premiere

FOR A WOMAN (Pour une femme)

Written and directed by: Diane Kurys

Los Angeles Premiere

HOW I CAME TO HATE MATH (Comment j’ai détesté les maths)

Directed by: Olivier Peyon

Written by: Olivier Peyon, Amandine Escoffier

North American Premiere

IN THE YARD (Dans la cour)

Directed by: Pierre Salvadori

Written by: David Léotard, Pierre Salvadori

North American Premiere

JACKY IN THE KINGDOM OF WOMEN (Jacky au royaume des femmes)

Written and directed by: Riad Sattouf

North American Premiere

L’AUBERGE ESPAGNOLE

Written and directed by: Cédric Klapisch
